member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InteractionRequest.IInteractionRequest
member.summary: Represents a request from user interaction.
member.remarks: View models can expose interaction request objects through properties and raise them when user interaction is required so views associated with the view models can materialize the user interaction using an appropriate mechanism.

member.summary: Fired when the interaction is needed.

member.summary: Specifies the name of the Event this EventTriggerBase is listening for.
member.returns: This implementation always returns the Raised event name for ease of connection with .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction
member.summary: Trigger action that executes a command when invoked. It also maintains the Enabled state of the target control based on the CanExecute method of the command.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction.CommandProperty
member.summary: Dependency property identifying the command to execute when invoked.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction.CommandParameterProperty
member.summary: Dependency property identifying the command parameter to supply on command execution.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction.Invoke
member.summary: Public wrapper of the Invoke method. No parameter is passed here, as the parameter in the Invoke method is ignored in this class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction.Invoke(System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the command
member.param: This parameter is ignored; the CommandParameter specified in the CommandParameterProperty is used for command invocation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction.OnDetaching
member.summary: Sets the Command and CommandParameter properties to null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction.OnAttached
member.summary: This method is called after the behavior is attached. It updates the command behavior's Command and CommandParameter properties if necessary.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction.Command
member.summary: Gets or sets the command to execute when invoked.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction.CommandParameter
member.summary: Gets or sets the command parameter to supply on command execution.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction.ExecutableCommandBehavior
member.summary: A CommandBehavior that exposes a public ExecuteCommand method. It provides the functionality to invoke commands and update Enabled state of the target control. It is not possible to make the inherit from , since the must already inherit from , so we chose to follow the aggregation approach.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity.InvokeCommandAction.ExecutableCommandBehavior.#ctor(System.Windows.UIElement)
member.summary: Constructor specifying the target object.
member.param: The target object the behavior is attached to.
